pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Omega 3 Triple Strength Odourless 150 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Molecularly distilled for quality and purity, our fish oil has been subtly flavoured with natural lemon oil and encapsulated in a natural orange
flavoured capsule to reduce fish odours. One capsule contains 3 times the active components found in a standardˆfish oil capsule.
The fish oil is harvested responsibly from fish to an IFFO RS* and FOS** standard, ensuring no risk to species endangerment.
ˆ standard natural fish oil, providing Omega-3 marine triglycerides 300mg Equiv Eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA) 180mg Equiv Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) 120mg. *IFFO RS: International Fishmeal and Fish
Oil Organisation Responsible Supply. **Friend of the Sea

Suitable For: Cardiovascular health, healthy brain function, eye function

Size: 150 capsules

KEY FEATURES

• Heart, Eye Health & Brain Function Support
• Odourless, sustainably sourced, mercury tested

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional. Supplements should not replace a balanced diet. DERIVED FROM SEAFOOD.

Ingredients

Each capsule provides
Concentrated Fish Omega-3 Triglycerides 1.5g
Provides Omega-3 marine triglycerides 900mg
Equiv. EPA (Eicosapentaenoic acid) 540mg
Equiv. DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid) 360mg
Encapsulating aids, Natural flavours.

Contains: Contains: Animal product, fish products, soya bean products, sulfites.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Take 1 capsule daily with food and a glass of cold water. Or take as directed by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place below 30°C.
